name: Kalimari
description:
Help Kalimari dodge the Fish-Bones and collect shells in this little arcade dodge the creeps game.

Control Kalimari by tapping or clicking  where you want her to go. Share your high-score in the comments!

This is a game I made for learning Godot.

The goal was;

  • Learn some Godot Basics by following their 2d tutorial
  • Play with their shader tool
  • Experiment with some hand drawn animation
  • Create something I could put on the Google Play Store as well as online
  • Publish a small scope game and move onto the next one

-----

Banner Artwork: Tom Bevan (https://www.graphicography.com/)
